text: Our parking facility is located at 101 Main Street, near the city center. We support hourly and daily reservations and offer 24/7 CCTV monitoring.
The garage entrance is on Main Street between 1st and 2nd Avenue. Use the blue gate marked 'City Parking' and take a ticket at the barrier.
Amenities include EV charging on level P2, accessible parking near elevators, and security patrols every hour.
To reserve a space, provide your name, surname, car number, and the desired reservation period. A human administrator confirms each booking.
Please arrive within 30 minutes of your reservation start time. Overnight parking is allowed for multi-day bookings. Lost tickets incur a fee.
Payment is accepted by card or mobile wallet at the kiosk or via the mobile app.
Cancellations are free up to 2 hours before the reservation start. To cancel, provide your booking reference to the support desk.
For general support, visit the information desk on level P1 during working hours. You can also use the in-app help center for non-urgent questions.
